name: alleato-elements-workers
description: Cloudflare Workers for Alleato AI Elements backend infrastructure

scripts.install:all: npm install && cd ai-agent-worker && npm install && cd ../fireflies-ingest-worker && npm install && cd ../vectorize-worker && npm install
scripts.deploy:all: npm run deploy:ai-agent && npm run deploy:fireflies && npm run deploy:vectorize && npm run deploy:insights
scripts.lint: echo 'Linting all workers...' && cd ai-agent-worker && npm run lint && cd ../fireflies-ingest-worker && npm run lint && cd ../vectorize-worker && npm run lint
scripts.typecheck: echo 'Type checking all workers...' && cd ai-agent-worker && npm run typecheck && cd ../fireflies-ingest-worker && npm run typecheck && cd ../vectorize-worker && npm run typecheck
